channel.title: Android on Scott's Weblog
channel.description: Recent content in Android on Scott's Weblog

item.title: Technology Short Take 131
item.description: Welcome to Technology Short Take #131! I’m back with another collection of articles on various data center technologies. This time around the content is a tad heavy on the security side, but I’ve still managed to pull in articles on networking, cloud computing, applications, and some programming-related content. Here’s hoping you find something useful here!
